My name is Jill Willey. Today it's the 8th of August and I'm here at the Ellen Lynx offices

very interesting organisation known as GOATS, meaning Getting On in the Shed group. My apologies,
Getting On at the Shed. Thank you, Liz. Liz, could you just give us your full name and

minutes? I was born in the Midlands. I was born in Nottingham where I spent almost 30
years there. Then I moved down to Devon, to Plymouth and I spent almost 30 years there

It's been absolutely beautiful. We've been very lucky with the weather, not just because it's
